Dandelion Datatables v0.8.4

21 February 2013

Dandelion-Datatables v0.8.4 has been released in Maven Central.

Changes

  • DataTables4j has became Dandelion-datatables! See the migration guide!

Issues

  • issue #16 - Dynamic value for table’s id
  • issue #17 - Table display issue

for more information, see dandelion-datatables changlog
